class.name: MessageFormatterBuilder
class.description: Constructor for [MessageFormatter]. Set the individual properties for a given MessageFormatter, before calling [method build]. Bridge for [url=https://unicode-org.github.io/icu-docs/apidoc/released/icu4c/classicu_1_1message2_1_1MessageFormatter_1_1Builder.html]ICU4C's MessageFormatter::Builder[/url]

method.name: build
method.description: Construct a new [MessageFormatter] from all the properties of this builder.

members.member: UTF-8 encoded array of the [url=https://messageformat.unicode.org/docs/reference/patterns/]Pattern[/url] to use.
